turns.content:
Certainly! Here is the table you requested:

| Category | Description | Grouping | Coins | Market Volume |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Payments | Cryptocurrencies designed for facilitating peer-to-peer payments and money transfers | Use Case | Bitcoin, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ripple, Stellar | $200B+ |
| Store of Value | Cryptocurrencies designed to hold and preserve value over time | Use Case | Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance Coin, Dogecoin, Cardano | $400B+ |
| Privacy Coins | Cryptocurrencies designed to provide enhanced privacy and anonymity for transactions | Use Case | Monero, Zcash, Dash, Pirate Chain, Beam | $5B+ |
| Decentralized Finance (DeFi) | Cryptocurrencies and blockchain-based applications designed for decentralized financial services | Use Case | Uniswap, Aave, Compound, Maker, SushiSwap | $60B+ |
| Gaming | Cryptocurrencies designed for in-game purchases and transactions | Use Case | Enjin Coin, Decentraland, WAX, The Sandbox, Chiliz | $2B+ |
| Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) | Cryptocurrencies designed for the creation, buying, and selling of unique digital assets | Use Case | CryptoPunks, Bored Ape Yacht Club, Art Blocks, Axie Infinity, Board Ape Kennel Club | $10B+ |
| Internet of Things (IoT) | Cryptocurrencies designed for enabling communication and payments between devices | Use Case | IOTA, Waltonchain, VeChain, Helium, IoTeX | $2B+ |
| Infrastructure | Cryptocurrencies designed to provide underlying technology and infrastructure for other blockchain-based applications | Technology | Ethereum, Polkadot, Solana, Cardano, Cosmos | $300B+ |
| Smart Contracts | Cryptocurrencies designed to execute and enforce self-executing contracts | Technology | Ethereum, Cardano, Solana, Polkadot, Binance Smart Chain | $300B+ |
| Proof of Stake (PoS) | Cryptocurrencies that utilize PoS consensus mechanism for |  |  |  |

Please expand it.

Please write in English language.

Sure! Here is an expanded version of the table for importing into Excel:

| Category | Description | Grouping | Coins | Market Volume |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Privacy Coins | Cryptocurrencies focused on ensuring the anonymity and privacy of transactions. | Use Case | Monero, Dash, Zcash, Grin, Pirate Chain | $4.4B - $1.4B |
| Smart Contract Platforms | Blockchains that allow for the execution of programmable smart contracts. | Technology | Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Cardano, Solana, Polkadot | $215B - $23.8B |
| Decentralized Exchanges (DEXs) | Cryptocurrency exchanges that operate on a decentralized platform. | Use Case | Uniswap, Sushiswap, Pancakeswap, 1inch, Curve | $9.3B - $1.1B |
| Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) | Digital assets that represent ownership of unique items such as art, collectibles, and real estate. | Trendy | CryptoPunks, Axie Infinity, Bored Ape Yacht Club, Art Blocks, NBA Top Shot | $11.5B - $37M |
| Stablecoins | Cryptocurrencies pegged to the value of an underlying asset such as fiat currency or commodities. | Use Case | Tether, USD Coin, Binance USD, Dai, TerraUSD | $130B - $2.9B |
| Governance Tokens | Tokens used for decentralized governance and decision-making within a blockchain ecosystem. | Use Case | Aave, Compound, Uniswap, Synthetix, SushiSwap | $18.3B - $1B |
| Layer-2 Scaling Solutions | Technologies built on top of existing blockchains to increase transaction speed and reduce costs. | Technology | Polygon, Optimism, Arbitrum, Binance Smart Chain, Fantom | $16.8B - $1.4B |
| Payment Coins | Cryptocurrencies designed to be used as a means of payment for goods and services. | Use Case | Bitcoin, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Dogecoin, Dash | $1.1T - $1.7B |
| Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) | Digital versions of national currencies issued by central banks. | Trendy | e-CNY, Digital Euro, Digital Dollar, Digital Yen, Digital Swiss Franc | N/A |
| Wrapped Assets | Tokens that represent real-world assets such as stocks, gold, and real estate on a blockchain. | Use Case | Wrapped Bitcoin, tokenized gold, real estate-backed tokens, FTX Leveraged Tokens, 1INCH | $20.2B - $6M |
| Social Tokens | Cryptocurrencies created by individuals, communities, or organizations for a specific purpose or community. | Use Case | $HUE, Whale, $ALEX, Friends With Benefits, $WHALE | $1.7B - $4M |
| Energy Coins | Cryptocurrencies focused on sustainable energy and the environment. | Use Case | Energy Web Token, Power Ledger, WePower, SunContract, Electrify Asia | $153M - $3M |
| Gaming Coins | Cryptocurrencies used in the gaming industry for in-game purchases and rewards. | Use Case | Enjin Coin, Chiliz, The Sandbox, Gala Games, Decentraland | $4.4B - $27M |
| Oracles | Technologies that provide external data to smart contracts on a blockchain. | Technology | Chainlink, Band Protocol, Augur, DIA, Tellor | $6.3B - $85M |
| Privacy |  |  |  |  |
